city.name: Tokyo
city.description: I would like to visit Tokyo because of its unique blend of traditional and modern culture, amazing food, and stunning architecture.

favouriteSubjects.name: Machine Learning
favouriteSubjects.description: Machine Learning is a branch of artificial intelligence that focuses on developing algorithms and models that enable computers to learn from and make predictions or decisions based on data, without being explicitly programmed.

favouriteSubjects.name: Full Stack Development
favouriteSubjects.description: The process of creating web applications from scratch, including database management, server-side operations, client-side programming, and user interface design, is known as full stack development.

favouriteSubjects.name: Engineering Business
favouriteSubjects.description: Engineering Business Systems integrates engineering principles with business and information systems to optimize organizational processes and improve efficiency and decision-making.

historicPlaces.name: Constitution Hill
historicPlaces.description: It housed political activists like Nelson Mandela, Gandhi, and Winnie Madikizela-Mandela.

historicPlaces.name: Apartheid Museum
historicPlaces.description: Apartheid Museum features interactive exhibits, including personal accounts and artifacts.

historicPlaces.name: Cradle of Humankind
historicPlaces.description: It's home to the Sterkfontein Caves, where the famous Mrs. Ples and Little Foot fossils were found.
